document.docAuthor: Bolger, Thomas, Arroyo, Julio & Piotrowska, Katarzyna
document.masterDocTitle: A catalogue of the species of Mesostigmata (Arachnida, Acari, Parasitiformes) recorded from Ireland including information on their geographical distribution and habitats

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A catalogue of the species of Mesostigmata (Arachnida, Acari, Parasitiformes) recorded from Ireland including information on their geographical distribution and habitats

subSubSection.paragraph:
•
Uropoda ( Uropoda ) halberti
Hirschmann, 1993
• Original name :
Uropoda halberti Hirschmann, 1993
. • In : Acarologie . Schriftenreihe für Vergleichende Milbenkunde , 40: 200. • Combinations/variations used in Irish literature:
Haluropoda minor Halbert (Halbert, 1915)
,
Trachyuropoda minor ( Halbert) (Halbert, 1920)
,
Phaulodinychus minor Halbert
( Hull, 1918 ; Healy, 1975 , Speight & Healy, 1977 ).
Irish Records : Rocky shores and under stones resing on mud ( Halbert, 1915 , 1920 ); debris form nests of
seagulls and puffins ( Halbert, 1915 , 1920 ); soil and vegetation in saltmarsh ( Healy, 1975 ; Speight & Healy,

• Combinations/variations used in Irish literature:
Discopoma integra Berlese
( Halbert, 1915 ; Hull, 1918 ),

Olodiscus minima Kramer
( Curry, 1969a , b , 1976a , 1979; Longworth, 1973 ; Ganley, 1976 ; Whelan, 1976 ,
Counties: Carlow, Clare, Cork, Dublin, Galway, Kerry, Kildare, Kilkenny, Laois, Limerick, Mayo, Meath, Offaly, Sligo, Waterford, Wexford, Wicklow .
• In : Zoologiae Danicae Prodromus , seu Animalium Daniae and Norvegicae Indigenarum . Characteres , Nomina , and Synonyma Imprimis Popularum ,187.
Counties: Cork, Dublin, Galway, Kerry, Kildare, Laois, Mayo, Meath, Monaghan, Offaly, Wexford, Wicklow .
